result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Violate No Contact Court Order (Misdemeanor Conviction)

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Demetrius Roman Roberson

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Demetrius Roman Roberson not in court.  Attorney Michael V Fuentes in court for Demetrius Roman Roberson.  Prosecuting attorney Olivia Simmons in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case set for status conference.  Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a Bench Warrant to be issued forthwith. COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE BENCH WARRANT. Court takes no action as to bail.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE BENCH  WARRANT.

Defendant Demetrius Roman Roberson not in court.  Attorney Michael V Fuentes in court for Demetrius Roman Roberson.  
Prosecuting attorney Olivia Simmons in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Deputy Court Clerk: rmm. 
OFF THE RECORD.  Matter set for status conference.  No appearance by the defendant.  As the court has no court reporter available, Court ordered matter adjourned for status.Case is adjourned to Br. 1.
Status conference scheduled for September 13, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Pretrial Services Discharge Report 08-30-2022, filed.  rmm
Justice Point Violation Report forwarded to Judge for review and filed.
All previously ordered bail conditions remain in full force and effect.
Bail motion by defense argued and granted by the Court. Cash bond to be converted to a signature bond.

Defendant Demetrius Roman Roberson in court with attorney Michael V Fuentes.  Michael J. Odden appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case in court for status conference.  Defense received an offer, still awaiting discovery. Defense is requesting adjourned status date to determine case posture.  Case adjourned to Branch 01.  Status conference scheduled for September 9, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Michael V Fuentes in court, defendant Demetrius Roman Roberson not in court, in custody, appearance waived.  Julie D Knyszek appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Hearing held via zoom. Status Conference held. Attorney Fuentes is waiting on discovery and an offer, requesting an additional status date. Case is adjourned in Branch 01.  Status conference scheduled for August 8, 2022 at 10:00 am.

Attorney Michael V Fuentes in court, defendant Demetrius Roman Roberson not in court, in custody.  
Abby Rockendorf appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Deputy Court Clerk: rmm.
Hearing held via Zoom.  Pretrial conference held.  Atty. Fuentes has just been appointed and has not received discovery or an offer. Atty. Fuentes requests a status date.  Case is adjourned to Br. 1.  This case will be heard via Zoom. Zoom meeting information provided to parties.  Status conference scheduled for July 28, 2022 at 10:00 am.

Court ordered no contact with Carmen M. J.; Carla M. J.;  
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 4.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Demetrius Roman Roberson in court with attorney Stephen Andrew Sargent.  Defendant Demetrius Roman Roberson in custody.  Tristan J. Bednarek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Demetrius Roman Roberson appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Davila, Branch 1. Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant pled not guilty.   DEFENDANT IS NOT INDIGENT. This hearing may be streamed live at the Court's discretion on https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/83289ee0-2326-3076-b9a3-4c551cf64527  Pre-trial conference scheduled for June 28, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
